title: NBA & NHL Playoffs, Golf Controversy and Apollo Global
itunes:title: NBA & NHL Playoffs, Golf Controversy and Apollo Global
description:
Join Michael Barr, Scarlet Fu and Mike Lynch on Business of Sports as they discuss the NBA and NHL playoffs, controversy in the golf world and Apollo Global's $1.25 billion Mexican soccer investment. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
